item.description:
Learn to love another person in their world, rather than how you currently love them or want to love them. Learn various ways to love beyond what's familiar, and how you gain from that. Several exercises highlight ways to love another person in the unique ways they need. See how to love, develop yourself in the process, and ask for what you want.

Optional fabulous macrobiotic dinner from 7 to 8:30 for $20 additional. Let me know 1 day in advance if you want this.

Workshop 8:30-10pm, $30, sliding scale to $15

at Margaret/David's house
99 Crescent St., Newton MA

Led by Herb Pearce, M.Ed., in Counseling, who has led this workshop many times. He has done relationship counseling and relationship workshops for over 30 years.

Herb Pearce, 781 648 3737, www.herbpearce.com, herb@herbpearce.com
item.name: Learning to Love Another Person
